KnowledgeBase.title: Knowledge base
KnowledgeBase.description: Specify the model`s sources for accurate, reliable responses.

tip1.m1: RAG: select documents and return to the chat.
tip1.m2: CAG: select documents and click the download button, then return to the chat.

CommandEmpty.m2: You don’t have any documents yet.

KnowledgeBase.toast1: You cannot select more than {doc} documents

description.m1: RAG: Sends only relevant parts of your documents. It`s cost-efficient and dynamic, but may be slightly slower due to retrieval time.
description.m2: CAG: Sends the full document content. It`s faster at response time but more expensive and limited by the model`s context window.
description.m3: For large document sets, RAG is ideal. In some cases, combining both gives the best results.

ViewUploadedAtt.title: Analyze images and extract text from files.

DeleteAllChats.title: Delete all chats
DeleteAllChats.toast_error: All messages have been successfully deleted.
DeleteAllChats.description_1: This action will permanently remove all your chats from our servers.
DeleteAllChats.description_3: Are you sure you want to proceed?

delete.description_1: Deleting your account will permanently revoke access to SmartTools services, including AI tools.
delete.description_2: If your account is subscribed, deleting it will result in the loss of your active subscriptions.
delete.description_3: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us via email at {email}.
delete.description_4: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
delete.description_5: To confirm, please type DELETE in the field below:

messages.title: 1,500+ messages per month
messages.description: Includes support for up to 100 image generations, depending on your token balance. Actual usage may vary based on the model and content size.

models.title: Access to all models
models.description: Enjoy GPT-4o, GPT-4o-mini, and 3o-mini — with more models coming soon!

realtime.title: Real-time chat with up to 8 members.
realtime.description: Collaborate instantly with members and AI in the same conversation.

attachments.title: Attachment support
attachments.description: Includes RAG & CAG support with up to 50 document uploads

support.title: Priority Support
support.description: Get faster responses and personalized, priority support whenever you need it

description.m1: This action cannot be undone. Once deleted, the attachments will be permanently removed. Are you sure you want to proceed?

description.hasDocuments: Ready to dive in? Let’s study smarter, not harder.
description.noDocuments: You don’t have any documents yet. Upload them in the knowledge base and let AI help you study better.
description.noDocumentsYet: You don’t have any documents yet.

agreementMessage.message: By sending your message, you agree to our

item1.trigger: Can I collaborate with others in real-time?
item1.content: Absolutely! Invite your friends or teammates and chat together in real-time. Brainstorm ideas, solve problems, or just have fun — all in one shared conversation with AI. (Real-time for plus plan only)

item2.content: Yes! We’ve started with OpenAI models like GPT-4o, GPT-4o-mini, and 3o-mini — and we're actively working on adding more models from OpenAI and other providers. Stay tuned!

item3.content: Yes! We support a wide range of file formats, including: PDF, PNG, SVG, JPEG, JPG, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, and TXT.

item4.content: Definitely! Just $9.99/month. Our flexible token system adapts to your usage — lighter models give you over 1,500 messages per month, while heavier models use more tokens.

accordionNewChat.footer: 🚀 Ready to try it out? Send your first message or check out our FAQ chat for more!

username.title: User name
username.message: Username must be at least 2 characters long.

password.title: Password
password.message1: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
password.message2: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
password.message3: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
password.message4: Password must contain at least one digit.
password.message5: Password must contain at least one special character.
